pkgmetadata.longdescription: ********pathable********About#####Object-oriented pathsKey features************* Traverse resources like paths* Access resources on demand with separate accessor layerUsage#####.. code-block:: python from pathable import DictPath d = { "parts": { "part1": { "name": "Part One", }, "part2": { "name": "Part Two", }, }, } dp = DictPath(d) # Concatenate paths with / parts = dp / "parts" # Stat path keys "part2" in parts # Open path dict with parts.open() as parts_dict: print(parts_dict)
